main.name: Chen Gu
main.description: with about 3 year of working experience in software development
main.intro: Software engineer with about 3 year of working experience
main.bio:
Experienced in designing and building multiple back-end and front-end applications and worked on projects in various domains with tech stacks including Java, Python, MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS, React.js, and CI/CD.

I am a great problem solver, a self-motivated individual, a technophile obsessed with the latest new tech. I’ve always been willing to learn new technologies and am passionate to apply my skills to tackle and solve business challenges.
skills: Programing languages: Java, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQLite
Framework/Libraries: Spring Boot, React.js, Node.js, jQuery
Version Control & CI/CD: GitHub, TFS, Azure DevOps, Jenkins, Jira
Others: AWS, Docker, Maven, Tomcat, Postman, Cloud Foundry, REST, Wireshark, Hibernate, Servlet, Junit

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.Coursework: Object-Oriented Design, Algorithm, Web Development, Computer System, Database Management, Mobile Application Development, Computer Networks

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
education.Coursework: Management Information Systems, Data Mining for Business, Data Management in the Enterprise, Business Systems Integration, Financial Management

work.title: Software Engineer
description:
Participate in developing and maintaining scientific analysis tool and database for scientists to analyze microbial Genomes 
 
Implement new features in backend java app under the guidance of a group of scientists, improved front end web UI
Maintain the project CI/CD, ensured the latest version of software is always reflected on docker hub

work.title: Software Engineer Coop
description: Participated in cloud-based framework implementation for the project under patient Monitoring that enables predictive analytics for multiple connected healthcare application
Enhanced Backend Java and C# application under Spring framework, .NET Core, improved front-end app under jQuery
Analyzed and fixed 20 security vulnerabilities for both on-prem application and cloud application
Developed and implemented IAM onboarding scripts in python for test team
Maintained services using HTTP, REST, JSON and XML and performed unit test on services end to end ensuring system working healthily with logging monitor
Composed and improved various documents including feature spec, deployments, and compliance

work.title: Data Analyst Intern
description:
Participated in client data migration projects and improved the quality and accuracy of Client reference data by 20% 
Improved reports procedures and saved five hours of manual work every week 
Processed an average of ten requests every day, created and corrected data elements on the Salesforce platform

work.title: Reconciliation Analyst Coop
description:
Ensured all daily financial reports are delivered and automated data feeds are properly posted to all reconciliation platform 
Provided detailed commentary to facilitate ledger breaks clearances and escalate to responsible party for research
Communicated with various internal and external clients and responded to inquiries in a timely manner

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.category: – A Web-based ERP Application for small business
description: Developed a web ERP application to calculating ratios, manipulate CRUD with GAPP accounting principle applied
Designed and built schema in MySQL on AWS RDS, applied stored procedures and triggers to facilitate order manipulation
Created RESTful API using Servlet in Java, used Hibernate for ORM, structured web interface using Bootstrap and jQuery

projects.title: NewsBee Forum Web Application
description: Developed a single page web application for individuals to read news along with peer commentators
Built the web interface using React.js and Phoenix, implemented SPA with Redux and React-Router
Structured the relational database (Postgres), implemented server to server external API connection to third-party libraries

projects.title: Roll Own CDN
description: Built a small content delivery networks(CDN) in python, used multiple AWS EC2 server as original and replica server
Implemented DNS server dynamically respond to client the best replica server, constructed DNS packet from scratch
Developed an LRU cache mechanism in HTTP server that effectively fetches content from the origin server
Ranked top 3 fastest CDN in performance competition in class

projects.title: Diglett Chat Application
description: Built a web-based online chatting application that supports 500 users online, deployed the service locally using Tomcat
Created RESTful API with Java, structured web interface using ReactJS framework
Implemented Hibernate for ORM with the MySQL database and deployed on AWS RDS

projects.title: Sleep Forest Android Application
description: Built an android Sleep management application in java and deployed on Google Play
Utilized android sensor to capture data from end-users, stored data using android SQLite database
Implemented reward system, updated user interface to improve user engagement
